cause.description:
Whether it's through the "Trick-or-Treat for UNICEF" program every Halloween or making a donation at any time of the year, the United Nations Children's Fund allows us all the opportunity to make a difference in children's lives all throughout the world. Visit www.unicefusa.org and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicef to learn more.
1. To Advance Humanity Through Helpful Causes
2. To Protect, Educate and Advocate for All Children
3. To Encourage Friends to Make Donations to UNICEF
cause.mission: Support the United Nations Children's Fund
cause.name: Advance Humanity
